title: Font ID: Sacré Français music video fonts...
content:
I love this song and I love the fonts used in the video.

In particular, this one here:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013359im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sacreparis_5492.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013359im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2_4005.png)

Thanks Guys!!!

Mikey :-)

 [‹ Tuscan-style "Patriots" logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013359/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44102 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 'Medeski, Martin & Wood' Alternate Gothic-like sans - Bee {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013359/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44104 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
Moderno does not support international characters? My title for this thread is all messed up.

It should read: Sacré Français
Try ’Shag’ by House Industries ( [www.houseind.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709013359/http:/www.houseind.com/ "www.houseind.com")). It’s not the exact font, but it’s close(ish).
Is Sacré Français the song name? What band is this from?
